title: Gold player looking for team
body:
Gday boys and girls im looking for a team that I can play seriously with to improve myself as a player and a team member i have practiced shot calling if thats what your team needs but im also ok to let someone else do shot calling if its for the best of the team. im interested in having a team that does practice/scrims add me in game if you have any questions

Edited: made the post more serious for what i want
